reviewText: Froze after only watching it s couple times... Not happy with it.
I grew up watching this video and it brings back so many wonderful memories!!

Extremely creepy and disturbing. They have dubbed adult mouths over the baby mouths to make it look like they are singing the songs and the voices are adults trying to sound like babies. It's just way too weird. Good if you want your children to have nightmares.

I ordered one of these sets and it was damaged.  I returned it for a refund.  The refund was processed quickly and smoothly.  I was bummed that it didn't work as my son with special needs LOVES these two movies.  I was sent a new dvd set for free for the troubles.  Thank you so much!  He is a VERY happy boy!!!
